Text.Page:
As incredible as it seems, those {@LinkCreature:15#4#castanic} and {@LinkCreature:15#5#amani recruits} were stationed at the federation garrison here when the plague first struck. Their madness has irretrievably twisted them.

I weep for them, and for their families.

I fear the only kindness we can do them now is to end their misery. It's time they joined the rolls of Velika's honored dead.
Good work, <PCNAME>. I'll get these amulets to their families.
It's the right thing to do, <PCNAME>. Rest assured.
